segments.text: I see the woman focused on drying the plate, completely unaware of the chaos brewing around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is gushing out of the sink, cascading onto the floor like an uninvited guest.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed the puddle forming beneath her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are up to something, and my heart races at the thought of what could happen next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy climbs that unstable stool, reaching for cookies like it's the most normal thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a wave of worry as I imagine him losing his balance and tumbling backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands there, eagerly waiting for her cookie, her excitement palpable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she understands the risk involved in this secret mission of theirs.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the tranquil garden outside and the impending disaster inside is jarring.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I shake my head in disbelief that all this mischief is happening right under the woman's nose.
segments.speaker: PAR
